report.title: Taxon groups verification breakdown (filterable)
report.description: Verification breakdown by taxon group with standard filters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter#

column.name: pending
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'C' then o.id else null end)

column.name: verified
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'V' then o.id else null end)

column.name: queried
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'D' then o.id when 'S' then o.id else null end)

column.name: rejected
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'R' then o.id else null end)
